title: Priyanka-Nick Celebrate First Diwali, Hindustani Bhau Joins Bigg Boss & More From Entertainment
text:
1. Hindustani Bhau Joins Bigg Boss 13 As Wild Card Entry & Internet Has Declared Him The Winner Already

Bhau is Salman Khan’s great admirer, he revealed to him as Salman Khan hugged him. His real name is Vikas Fhatak and he is Sanjay Dutt fan. He even came to the show dressed up as his Vaastav’s character but he said he is now following Gandhigiri.

2. From Priyanka-Nick To Kareena-Saif, Bollywood Stars Get In Festive Mood To Celebrate Diwali

Nick Jonas and Priyanka Chopra, who not long ago gave us a glimpse into their first ever Karwa Chauth, is celebrating their first ever Diwali this year.

3. Emilia Clarke Rings In Her Birthday With An Epic GoT Reunion That Had Both Her On-Screen Lovers

Don't Miss 395 SHARES 5 K SHARES 1.5 K SHARES

She recently reunited with her Game of Thrones family. It was a mini yet epic Game of Thrones reunion, which became even more memorable because it was Emilia’s 33rd birthday. When she united with her Game of Thrones co-stars Kit Harington and Jason Momoa, our hearts screamed Dracarys!

4. While Delhi Is Choking, Shah Rukh Khan Still Wants Son AbRam To See Dilli Ki Diwali This Year

“I would love to celebrate Diwali in Delhi. Par humare Mumbai meing Diwali ki badi-badi parties hoti hain. Toh wahan jana lazmi hai. Who ek culture sa bann chukka hai. I have to rush back, but I’m here till Diwali. I have got my little son (AbRam) here with me. So, I’ll be taking him around the city, showing him Dilli Ki Diwali. Mujhe aisa lagta hai Diwali, Dussehra aur Holi jaise Dilli mein hota hai, kahin aur nahi hota. Ya phir mera yeh apna lagaav hai mujhe aisa lagta hai,” he was quoted as saying by TOI.

5. Actor Vishwa Bhanu Appeals To PM Modi After Muslim Neighbours Hinder His Diwali Celebrations

“I am living in a Muslim society in Mumbai Malad Malwani and like last year this year too people of the society start arguing with my wife on lighting up her house today. They were not allowing my wife to lighting up and making a rangoli on the gate outside the house. They destroyed the lights and the crowd forced me to remove the lights,” Vishwa Bhanu wrote on Saturday.
description: From Priyanka Chopra and Nick Joans celebrating their first Diwali together in Cabo, Mexico to Hindustani Bhau joining Bigg Boss 13 as wild card contestant, here is all that rocked the world of entertainment today.
